channel.title: 3,2,1 play?
channel.description:
hey,
i was wondering if anyone could give me a tut (obviously not alink coz they'd all be dead) on how to make a timer - lets say from 2 minutes down to 0 - then it teleports you into a certain area...
Thanks...

item.title: 3,2,1 play?
item.dc:creator: @pwned_i_lvl3 pwned i lvl3
item.description:
@pwned_i_lvl3 wrote:

[quote=“ownage plz, post:6, topic:114917”]first off
search for

public boolean process

directly under that add

if(teleTimer == 0) { teleportToX = 3222; teleportToY = 3218; teleTimer = 600; } if (teleTimer > 0) { teleTimer -= 1; }
then declare this int

public int teleTimer = 0;

i would try searching for

public int PkingDelay = 0;

now to explain it if the teletimer gets to 0 it teleports you to the x and y given then resets itself back to 600 or 1 min
the next bit says if the timer is greater than 0 remove 1 every second

and no 459 … expert … that wouldn’t work[/quote]
this seams to make more sence…
would i just put in

if (absX >= **** && absX <= **** && absY >= **** && absY <= ****
then put the tele timer… if yes how would i put it all there? thanks you’re halpin’ alot
